subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5100 is on the way

conversations.body_text: Hello, good afternoon. Is it normal that the tracking hasn’t been updated yet? I placed the order on the 23rd and it’s still the same.
Hi José Gil,  We have shipped your order, and the tracking information has been updated. Please check the latest status.
